name: Epic Evolution - Merge Game
description:
Play the miracle of evolution in the best tapping game in the universe!

- Merge, evolve and upgrade fish, there's nothing better you could do with your life!
- Discover all the unseen animals nature and tapper games can offer!
- Let fish earn you money, which does not make sense, but somehow it's fun!
- Watch video ads and click on them, because we want to buy food and make a new clicker game!
- Have fun tapping fish and never switch this idle clicker off!

Support
Do you have any evolution game related issues? Visit http://pxfd.co/support and reach out to our friendly community managers.

Terms of Use: http://pxfd.co/eula
Privacy Policy: http://pxfd.co/privacy
